DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate long-term safety effectiveness growth hormone ( Eutropin Inj./Eutropin plus Inj . ) treatment GHD ( Growth Hormone Deficiency ) , TS ( Turner Syndrome ) , CRF ( Chronic Renal Failure ) , SGA ( Small Gestational Age ) , ISS ( Idiopathic Short Stature ) .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Safety Effectiveness Growth Hormone With GHD , TS , CRF , SGA ISS Children
DOC.criteria: short stature child age 2 year child GHD , TS , CRF , SGA ISS write informed consent person , person 's parent legal guardian
